definitions.definition: A piece of paper given to students who are late to class.
definitions.example: The teacher gave her a tardy because she did not come into the classroom until after the bell.

definitions.definition: An instance of a student being marked as tardy by a teacher in his or her attendance sheet.

definitions.example: He yawned, then raised a tardy hand over his mouth.

definitions.definition: Moving with a slow pace or motion; not swift.
Ineffectual; slow-witted, slow to act, or dull.
definitions.example: His tardy performance bordered on incompetence.

definitions.definition: Unwary; unready (especially in the phrase take (someone) tardy).
